returns._0: the TWAP price of the pair of tokens
the state of the Oracle for a pair of tokens ordered lexicographically

returns.tickPriceX42: TWAP price of the pair of tokens

getUniswapFeeTiers().notice: Function for getting all the uniswap fee tiersIf a new fee tier is added, anyone can add it using the `newUniswapFeeTier` function

initialize(address,address).notice: Initialize the oracleState for the pair of tokensThe order of the tokens does not matter

newUniswapFeeTier(uint24).notice: Anyone can let the SIR factory know that a new fee tier exists in Uniswap V3

updateOracleState(address,address).notice: Update the oracle price for a pair of tokens, so that calls in the same block don't need to call Uniswap again.This function also checks periodically if there is a better fee tier.
